examples.example: 我已经付出了一半的努力，相信再坚持一下就会取得成功。

translate.english: I have already made half of the efforts, and I believe that if I persist a little bit more, I will succeed.

examples.example: 我把一半的时间用来提升自己，另一半用来享受生活。

translate.english: I spend half of the time on improving myself and the other half on enjoying life.

examples.example: 我把蛋糕分成了一半给妈妈，另一半给爸爸，大家都很开心。

translate.english: I divided the cake into half for mother and the other half for father, and everyone was very happy.
